header.headline-2: I work as a Front-End Developer & Digital Designer.

interview-teaser.headline: Interview
interview-teaser.text: My name is Maximilian. I work as a front-end developer and web designer at SNK in Munich.

headline.headline: Services
headline.subline: I create professional experiences now for more than 10 years.

teaser.headline: Development
teaser.text: Creating your User Interface designs, Marketing- and Landingpages or CMS-based company website would be a blast for me. I love to create websites with small tweaks like animations or 3D samples.

teaser.headline: Digital Design
teaser.text: I am a Front-End Developer since more than 10 years, worked on more than enough projects with small, medium sized and large group of businesses to get feeling what the user expects from these.

teaser.headline: UX & Solutions
teaser.text: Over the years I saw many things that were going into the wrong direction from the early beginning of a project. I saw many things going right and many projects which lacked on the ‘small things to compete’. I want that yours can learn from that experience.

headline.headline: Projects
headline.subline: My personal projects I work on in my freetime.

header.headline: Interview
header.subline: If you want to hear more about me as a person and personal views, here is a basic Q&A for you to catch up.

textBlock.headline: Über mich
textBlock.text: Mein Name ist Maximilian - oder koby. Ich bin 28 Jahre alt und arbeite zurzeit in München als Front-End Entwickler & Web-Designer bei @SNK. Ich lebe seit ungefähr 9 Jahren in München, ursprünglich komme ich aber aus dem schönen Dresden.
